modName: PRUFEI - Protection for Recipes Using Favorite and Equipped Items
summary: This mod stops you accidentally breaking-down favorite and equipped items when using recipes in compatible mods.
descriptionHtml:
[b][color=#f1c232][size=4]Functionality[/size][/color][/b]

This mod stops you accidentally breaking-down favorite and equipped items when using recipes in compatible mods. For the mod to actually protect favorite items requires the break-down recipes to be set up in a particular way, such as in the "Elementary Smelting" mod, or in other mods that make use of PRUFEI. By itself this mod will have no effect, it merely enables the [i]possibility[/i] of breakdown recipes that protect items. I would recommend first trying the mod with "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54378/]Elementary Smelting[/url]" (which, with its add-ons, is not so elementary anymore...).

If you only want to download a single file, an all-in-one version is available on the "[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54378/]Elementary Smelting[/url]" download page.
Â 
[b][color=#f1c232][size=4]Acknowledgements[/size][/color][/b]

This mod would have been impossible without major assistance from 'mrpwn' and 'IsharaMeradin' (who are not responsible for any bugs that
may remain). ipmlj provided useful suggestions concerning the text for in-game messages.

I thank those who have tried out the mod so far.

[size=4][b][color=#f1c232]Updates[/color][/b][/size]

[b]v0.6.2b[/b] is a more robust version of v0.5.1. The overall functionality is the same.

[b]v0.7.1b[/b] [b][i]must be used with Elementary Smelting v0.9.1b or later (or another compatible mod).[/i][/b]

[color=#f1c232][b][size=4]Small Request[/size][/b][/color]

[i]Please[/i] send me suggestions, feedback, comments, e.t.c. -- they provide the motivation to keep modding.
author: Matthew R Karlsen -- quixoticynic
